A
B
B --> A
A --> A
B --> C
C --> A
---
       +---------+
       |         |
       v         |
     +---+     +---+
     |   |     |   |
     | A |--+  | C |
     |   |  |  |   |
     +---+  |  +---+
       ^    |    ^
       |    |    |
       +----+    |
       |         |
       |         |
     +---+       |
     |   |       |
     | B |-------+
